name: Anemone (A.V. Knights)
description:
Anemone is a first-person mystery game.

Enter and explore a small house. Something happened here.... Simple immersive systems let you retrieve and use lights, keys, and other objects to help you. Who are you? What brought you here? Your own identity and motives are part of the mystery you'll unravel in Anemone.

avknights.com/anemone

ANEMONE IS COMING SOON
